ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Umm... easy on the mana...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Best use I ve found for it is when charming giants.  You can use it to soften up the first giant when there isn t a cyclops handy, or to insure that your
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 27 Mar 2000, Kevin L. Crawford wrote:
>
> By the way, does anyone here use dirge? I'd like to find out if it really
> lost it's taunt factor... used to be a pretty nasty taunter... if that is
> gone I REALLY want to know why.

Best use I've found for it is when charming giants. You can
use it to "soften up" the first giant when there isn't a
cyclops handy, or to insure that your pet will win the first
fight.

Otherwise, there are times when I think "hey, now would be a
nice time for dirge," but I don't have it loaded because those
situations don't happen that often.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
